trans-unit.source: Restrict access to email and O365 services | Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Restrict access to email and O365 services | Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: This topic describes how conditional can be used to allow only compliant devices to access company email and company data on SharePoint Online and other services.
trans-unit.target: This topic describes how conditional can be used to allow only compliant devices to access company email and company data on SharePoint Online and other services.

trans-unit.source: Restrict access to email, O365, and other services with Microsoft Intune
trans-unit.target: Restrict access to email, O365, and other services with Microsoft Intune

trans-unit.source: You can restrict access to your company email and O365 services with Intune's conditional access.
trans-unit.target: You can restrict access to your company email and O365 services with Intune's conditional access.

trans-unit.source: Intune's conditional access capability allows you to make sure that access to your company email and O365 services is restricted to devices that are compliant with the rules that you set.
trans-unit.target: Intune's conditional access capability allows you to make sure that access to your company email and O365 services is restricted to devices that are compliant with the rules that you set.

trans-unit.source: How does conditional access work?
trans-unit.target: How does conditional access work?

trans-unit.source: Compliance policy settings are used to evaluate the compliance of the device.
trans-unit.target: Compliance policy settings are used to evaluate the compliance of the device.

trans-unit.source: Conditional access policy uses the evaluation to restrict or allow access to a specific service.
trans-unit.target: Conditional access policy uses the evaluation to restrict or allow access to a specific service.

trans-unit.source: When a conditional access policy is used in combination with a compliance policy, only compliant devices will be allowed to access the service.
trans-unit.target: When a conditional access policy is used in combination with a compliance policy, only compliant devices will be allowed to access the service.

trans-unit.source: The compliance policy and the conditional access policy are deployed to the user.
trans-unit.target: The compliance policy and the conditional access policy are deployed to the user.

trans-unit.source: Any device that the user uses to access the services is checked for compliance with the policies.
trans-unit.target: Any device that the user uses to access the services is checked for compliance with the policies.

trans-unit.source: Keep in mind that the user who is using the device must have a compliance policy deployed to them in order for the device to be evaluated for compliance.
trans-unit.target: Keep in mind that the user who is using the device must have a compliance policy deployed to them in order for the device to be evaluated for compliance.

trans-unit.source: If no compliance policy is deployed to the user the device is treated as compliant, and no access restrictions will be applied.
trans-unit.target: If no compliance policy is deployed to the user the device is treated as compliant, and no access restrictions will be applied.

trans-unit.source: When devices do not meet the conditions set in the policies, the end user is guided though the process of enrolling the device and fixing the issue that prevents the device from being compliant.
trans-unit.target: When devices do not meet the conditions set in the policies, the end user is guided though the process of enrolling the device and fixing the issue that prevents the device from being compliant.

trans-unit.source: A typical flow of conditional access:
trans-unit.target: A typical flow of conditional access:

trans-unit.source: Diagram shows the decision points used to determine whether a device is allowed access to a service or is blocked
trans-unit.target: Diagram shows the decision points used to determine whether a device is allowed access to a service or is blocked

trans-unit.source: How to configure conditional access?
trans-unit.target: How to configure conditional access?

trans-unit.source: Use conditional access to manage access to Microsoft **Exchange On-premises**, **Exchange Online**, **Exchange Online Dedicated**, **SharePoint Online** and **Skype for Business Online**.
trans-unit.target: Use conditional access to manage access to Microsoft **Exchange On-premises**, **Exchange Online**, **Exchange Online Dedicated**, **SharePoint Online** and **Skype for Business Online**.

trans-unit.source: To set up conditional access, configure a device compliance policy, and a conditional access policy.
trans-unit.target: To set up conditional access, configure a device compliance policy, and a conditional access policy.

trans-unit.source: The compliance policy includes settings like passcode, encryption, and whether or not a device is jailbroken.
trans-unit.target: The compliance policy includes settings like passcode, encryption, and whether or not a device is jailbroken.

trans-unit.source: The device must meet these rules in order to be considered compliant.
trans-unit.target: The device must meet these rules in order to be considered compliant.

trans-unit.source: You can set a conditional access policy to restrict access based on:
trans-unit.target: You can set a conditional access policy to restrict access based on:

trans-unit.source: The device compliance status.
trans-unit.target: The device compliance status.

trans-unit.source: The platform running on the device.
trans-unit.target: The platform running on the device.

trans-unit.source: The type of apps used to access the services.
trans-unit.target: The type of apps used to access the services.

trans-unit.source: Unlike other Intune policies, you do not deploy conditional access policies.
trans-unit.target: Unlike other Intune policies, you do not deploy conditional access policies.

trans-unit.source: Instead, once you configure the policy and select the users that should have the policy, the policy is applied to all targeted users.
trans-unit.target: Instead, once you configure the policy and select the users that should have the policy, the policy is applied to all targeted users.

trans-unit.source: When a user is targeted by a policy, each device they use must be compliant in order to access resources.
trans-unit.target: When a user is targeted by a policy, each device they use must be compliant in order to access resources.
